name: A Day at the Museum
description:
As this is my first game so go EASY on me and I don't know a whole lot of how to program so that did limit what I could create.

A Day at the Museum is a game where you only have 20 or 30 seconds to kill everyone in the museum (I can't remember the time limit) very plain game it was made in like four and a half days so it isn't great but it is also unfinished.

Enjoy... I think?
